d1_flags: 1. goto C68264 if TEMP_10 is set
1. goto C6EE2E if MONSTERS_IN_WINTERS is set
1. goto C6EE6F if POKEY_FLIES_AWAY_BY_HELICOPTER is set
d1_text:
Npc0872:
[GOTO_IF_FLAG POKEY_FLIES_AWAY_BY_HELICOPTER L_C6EE6F]
[GOTO_IF_FLAG MONSTERS_IN_WINTERS L_C6EE2E]
ï¿½Look at my skinny arms,[PAUSE 20] thin body,[PAUSE 20] and gray hair...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I've become so weak since I lost the Mani Mani Statue.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'm sorry I kidnapped [PRINT_NAME PAULA].[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I haven't done anything to her.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...[PRINT_NAME PAULA] is a nice girl.[WAIT][CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
[PAUSE 60][SET_NPC_DIR 872 3]
[PAUSE 10][OPEN_TBOX 1]
ï¿½[PRINT_NAME PAULA].[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Return to [PRINT_NAME NESS].[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'm sorry I've created so much trouble for you.[WAIT][CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
[PAUSE 60][GOSUB L_C68253]
[SET_FLAG MONSTERS_IN_WINTERS]
[CLR_FLAG PAULA_AT_MONOTOLI_BUILDING]
[GET_DIR_FROM_NPC 872 PMEMBER LEADER][SET_NPC_DIR 872 0]
[RESTORE_MUSIC]
[PAUSE 120][OPEN_TBOX 1]
; $C6EB2C
L_C6EB2C:
ï¿½.....[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'll tell you everything.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The Mani Mani Statue creates an illusion.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It attracts evil spirits and weakens your heart.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The power scared me so much, I hid the statue in the warehouse at Jackie's Cafe.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I often went there to pray.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½.....[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Cryptic words appeared to me while I was in the illusion.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½[PRINT_NAME NESS], your name appeared in the cryptic messages.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½ï¿½Stop [PRINT_NAME NESS], and do so by your own hand.ï¿½[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Or...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½ï¿½Don't let them go to Summers.ï¿½[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Or...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½ï¿½Make sure they know nothing of the Pyramidï¿½...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I don't fully understand the messages,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½but someone obviously doesn't want you to go to Summers.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[PAUSE 60][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...Evil... Giygas... or something... I could hear the name...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Anyway, the evil side would be in trouble if you visit Summers...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Oh!  On the contrary, you should definitely go to Summers,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½especially because they don't want you to make it there.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½.....[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...Would you like to hear the whole story again?[LINE_BREAK]
[LOAD_STRING "Yes"]
[LOAD_STRING "No"]
[PRINT_STRINGS_HORZ 2]
[CREATE_MENU]
[CLEAR_LINE]
[MULTI_GOTO L_C6EB2C L_C6ED74]
; $C6ED74
L_C6ED74:
ï¿½Summers is located across the ocean.[PAUSE 20]  Take my helicopter.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'll open the door to my heliport.[WAIT][CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
[PAUSE 1][SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 872 701]
[WAIT_MOVEMENT]
[SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 876 702]
[WAIT_MOVEMENT]
[SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 876 44]
[FREEZE_NPC 872]
[MUSIC_EFFECT 3]
[PAUSE 180][PLAY_MUSIC 85]
[SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 877 703]
[WAIT_MOVEMENT]
[SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 877 8]
[MUSIC_EFFECT 2]
[PAUSE 30][PLAY_SFX 28]
[PAUSE 60][RESTORE_MUSIC]
[UNFREEZE_NPC 872]
[WAIT_MOVEMENT]
[SET_NPC_MOVEMENT_SCRIPT 872 8]
[OPEN_TBOX 1]
ï¿½You must go on![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½[PRINT_NAME NESS]![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½This is your destiny.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[SET_FLAG TREMBLING_MONOTOLI_AT_48TH_FLOOR_ABSENT]
[SET_FLAG MONOTOLI_AT_48TH_FLOOR]
; $C6EE2E
L_C6EE2E:
ï¿½[PRINT_STAT PAULA_NAME], it's time we said goodbye.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Take care.[HALT][CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
[SET_FLAG SENTRY_ROBOT_1_DEFEATED]
[SET_FLAG SENTRY_ROBOT_2_DEFEATED]
[SET_FLAG SENTRY_ROBOT_3_DEFEATED]
[SET_FLAG SENTRY_ROBOT_4_DEFEATED]
[SET_FLAG SENTRY_ROBOT_5_DEFEATED]
[SET_FLAG SENTRY_ROBOT_6_DEFEATED]
[SET_FLAG ENEMY_SUPPRESS]
[SET_FLAG PREVENT_TELEPORT]
[SET_FLAG 779]
[CLR_FLAG VENUS_AND_RUNAWAY_FANS_AT_TOPOLLA]
[END]
d1_lines: ï¿½Look at my skinny arms,[PAUSE 20] thin body,[PAUSE 20] and gray hair...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I've become so weak since I lost the Mani Mani Statue.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I haven't done anything to her.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...[PRINT_NAME PAULA] is a nice girl.[WAIT][CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
ï¿½I'm sorry I've created so much trouble for you.[WAIT][CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
ï¿½The Mani Mani Statue creates an illusion.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It attracts evil spirits and weakens your heart.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The power scared me so much, I hid the statue in the warehouse at Jackie's Cafe.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I often went there to pray.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Cryptic words appeared to me while I was in the illusion.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½[PRINT_NAME NESS], your name appeared in the cryptic messages.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½ï¿½Stop [PRINT_NAME NESS], and do so by your own hand.ï¿½[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½ï¿½Don't let them go to Summers.ï¿½[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½ï¿½Make sure they know nothing of the Pyramidï¿½...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I don't fully understand the messages,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½but someone obviously doesn't want you to go to Summers.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...Evil... Giygas... or something... I could hear the name...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Anyway, the evil side would be in trouble if you visit Summers...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Oh!  On the contrary, you should definitely go to Summers,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½especially because they don't want you to make it there.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...Would you like to hear the whole story again?[LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Summers is located across the ocean.[PAUSE 20]  Take my helicopter.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'll open the door to my heliport.[WAIT][CLOSE_ALL_TBOXES]
ï¿½[PRINT_STAT PAULA_NAME], it's time we said goodbye.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
